sub_topic: Determining the activation energy of a reaction
message_1: What is the activation energy of the reaction between hydrogen peroxide and iodide ions? Use the provided data on the reaction rate at different temperatures and apply the Arrhenius equation to determine the activation energy.
message_2: To determine the activation energy of the reaction between hydrogen peroxide and iodide ions, I will need the reaction rate data at different temperatures. Please provide the data so I can apply the Arrhenius equation and calculate the activation energy.
